Classes in com.foxhole.tools.spartan.actions that implement IGameActionObject
 class BasicGameAction
          The Basic Game action creates a standard abstract action to serve as a beginning point for all other actions in the framework, defining all the common functionality.

          A resource loading action that loads resources from the deference list while updating a percentage value in the target entity state.
 

Uses of IGameActionObject in com.foxhole.tools.spartan.actions.util
 

Classes in com.foxhole.tools.spartan.actions.util that implement IGameActionObject
 class EnterGameStateOnActionOver
          EnterGameStateOnActionOver is an action that monitors another action existence, and when that action ceases to exist, this action takes over and changes the Slick game state to the one defined in this action

          Creates a EnterGameStateOnActionOver.
